rows.arabic: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
rows.translation: BLESSED BE HE who holds the (reins of) Kingship in His hand, who has power over everything,
rows.transliteration: tabārakal ladhī biyadihil mulku wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in qadīr

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَٱلْحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفُورُ
rows.translation: Who created death and life in order to try you to see who of you are best of deed. He is all-mighty and forgiving,
rows.transliteration: alladhī khalaqal mawta wal ḥayāta liyabluwakum ayyukum aḥsanu `amalā ۚ wahuwal `azīzul ghafūr

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا ۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِى خَلْقِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِن تَفَـٰوُتٍ ۖ فَٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٍ
rows.translation: Who created the seven skies one above the other. Do you see any disproportion in the creations of Ar-Rahman? Turn your eyes again. Do you see any fissures?
rows.transliteration: alladhī khalaqa sab`a samāwātin ṭibāqā ۖ mā tarā fī khalqir raḥmāni min tafāwut ۖ farji`il baṣara hal tarā min fuṭūr

rows.arabic: ثُمَّ ٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌ
rows.translation: Turn your eyes again and again. Your gaze turns back dazed and tired.
rows.transliteration: thummar-ji`il baṣara karratayni yanqalib ilaykal baṣaru khāsi-an wahuwa ḥasīr

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَـٰطِينِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
rows.translation: We have adorned the lowest sky with lamps, and made them missiles against the devils, for whom We have prepared a torment of most intense fire.
rows.transliteration: walaqad zayyannas samā-ad dunyā bimaṣābīḥa waja`alnāhā rujūmal lishhayāṭīn ۖ wa-a`tadnā lahum `adhābas sa`īr

rows.arabic: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
rows.translation: For those who believe not in their Lord there is the punishment of Hell; and what a wretched destination
rows.transliteration: walilladhīna kafarū birabbihim `adhābu jahannam ۖ wabi-sal maṣīr

rows.arabic: إِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ فِيهَا سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِىَ تَفُورُ
rows.translation: When they are cast into it, they will hear it roar and raging
rows.transliteration: idhā ulqū fīhā sami`ū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūr

rows.arabic: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلْغَيْظِ ۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلْقِىَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌ
rows.translation: As though it would burst with fury. Every time a crowd is thrown into it, its wardens will ask: "Did no warner come to you?"
rows.transliteration: takādu tamayyazu minal ghayẓ ۖ kullamā ulqiya fīhā fawjun sa-alahum khazanatuhā alam ya-tikum nadhīr

rows.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٌ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ كَبِيرٍ
rows.translation: And they will answer: "Surely; a warner came to us, but we denied him, and said: 'God did not send down any thing; you are greatly deluded, in fact.'"
rows.transliteration: qālū balā qad jā-anā nadhīrun fakadhhabnā waqulnā mā nazzalallāhu min shay-in in antum illā fī ḍalālin kabīr

rows.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِىٓ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
rows.translation: They will say: "If we had listened and been wise, we would not have been among the inmates of Hell."
rows.transliteration: waqālū law kunnā nasma`u aw na`qilu mā kunnā fī aṣ-ḥābis sa`īr

rows.arabic: فَٱعْتَرَفُوا۟ بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسُحْقًا لِّأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
rows.translation: So will they confess their guilt. Deprived (of all joys) will be the inmates of Hell.
rows.transliteration: fa`tarafū bidhanbihim fasuḥqal li-aṣ-ḥābis sa`īr

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
rows.translation: For those who fear their Lord in secret is forgiveness and a great reward.
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil ghaybi lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīr

rows.arabic: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
rows.translation: Whether you say a thing secretly or openly, He knows the innermost secrets of your hearts.
rows.transliteration: wa-asirrū qawlakum awij-harū bih ۖ innahu `alīmun bidhātiṣ ṣudūr

rows.arabic: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
rows.translation: Can He who has created not know (His creation)? He is all-penetrating, all-aware.
rows.transliteration: alā ya`lamu man khalaqa wahuwallaṭīful khabīr

rows.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَٱمْشُوا۟ فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِهِۦ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
rows.translation: It is He who made the earth subservient to you that you may travel all around it, and eat of things He has provided; and to Him will be your resurrection.
rows.transliteration: huwal ladhī ja`ala lakumul-arḍa dhalūlan famshū fī manākibihā wakulū min rizqih ۖ wa ilayhin nushūr

rows.arabic: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ
rows.translation: Are you so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not open up the earth to swallow you, when it will begin to tremble?
rows.transliteration: a-amintum man fis samā-i an yakhsifa bikumul-arḍa fa-idhā hiya tamūr

rows.arabic: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ
rows.translation: Or have you become so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not send a violent wind to shower stones at you? Then you will know the import of My commination!
rows.transliteration: am amintum man fis samā-i an yursila `alaykum ḥāṣibā ۖ fasata`lamūna kayfa nadhīr

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
rows.translation: Those before them had also denied. And how was My punishment then!
rows.transliteration: walaqad kadhhabal ladhīna min qablihim fakayfa kāna nakīr

rows.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۭ بَصِيرٌ
rows.translation: Do they not see the birds above them flying wings spread out or folded? Nothing holds them aloft but God. All things are within His purview.
rows.transliteration: awalam yaraw ilaṭ ṭayri fawqahum ṣāffātin wayaqbiḍn ۚ mā yumsikuhunna illar raḥmān ۚ innahu bikulli shay-in baṣīr

rows.arabic: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ
rows.translation: What other army do you have to help you apart from Ar-Rahman? The unbelievers are surely lost in delusion.
rows.transliteration: amman hādhal ladhī huwa jundul lakum yanṣurukum min dūnir raḥmān ۚ inil kāfirūna illā fī ghurūr

rows.arabic: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ
rows.translation: Who is there to give you food in case He withholds His bounty? Yet they persist in rebellion and aversion.
rows.transliteration: amman hādhal ladhī yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah ۚ bal lajjū fī `utuwwin wanufūr

rows.arabic: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
rows.translation: Will he find the way who grovels flat on his face, or he who walks straight on the right path?
rows.transliteration: afaman yamshī mukibban `alā wajhihi ahdā amman yamshī sawiyyan `alā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm

rows.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
rows.translation: Say: "It is He who raised you and gave you ears and eyes and hearts. How little are the thanks you offer!"
rows.transliteration: qul huwal ladhī ansha-akum waja`ala lakumus sam`a wal-abṣāra wal-af-idah ۖ qalīlan mā tashkurūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
rows.translation: Say: "It is He who dispersed you all over the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."
rows.transliteration: qul huwal ladhī dhara-akum fil-arḍi wa ilayhi tuḥsharūn

rows.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
rows.translation: But they say: "When will this promise come to pass, if what you say is true?"
rows.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhal wa`du in kuntum ṣādiqīn

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
rows.translation: Say: "God alone has knowledge. My duty is only to warn you clearly."
rows.transliteration: qul innamal `il-mu `indallāhi wa innamā ana nadhīrun mubīn

rows.arabic: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيٓـَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِيلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
rows.translation: When they realise it has come upon them, distraught will be the faces of unbelievers. They will be told: "This is what you asked for."
rows.transliteration: falammā ra-awhu zulfatan sī-at wujūhul ladhīna kafarū waqīla hādhal ladhī kuntum bihi tadda`ūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
rows.translation: Say: "Just think: If God destroys me and those with me, or is benevolent to us, who will then protect the unbelievers from a painful doom?"
rows.transliteration: qul ara aytum in ahlakaniyallāhu wa man ma`iya aw raḥimanā faman yujīrul kāfirīna min `adhābin alīm

rows.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
rows.translation: Say: "He is the benevolent; in Him do we believe, and in Him do we place our trust. You will now realise who is in manifest error."
rows.transliteration: qul huwar raḥmānu āmannā bihi wa`alayhi tawakkalnā ۖ fasata`lamūna man huwa fī ḍalālin mubīn

rows.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍ مَّعِينٍۭ
rows.translation: Say: "Just think: If your water were to dry up in the morning who will bring you water from a fresh, flowing stream?"
rows.transliteration: qul ara aytum in aṣbaḥa mā-ukum ghawran faman ya-tīkum bimā-in ma`īn
